messages: good afternoon to our friends in the south just sending this message to open a channel for future relations when ever they need to happen and to say howdy and have a good game to you
of course i thank you very much the future of the kaissereich and its effect on my neighbors will be very important to me so tell me if you want help to dissuade attack
well should the french turn out to be a thorn in my side i would greatly appreciate the aid
greetings from new italy

would just like to reiterate that italy would likely take an opportunistic stance towards france their defensive position is strong enough that i wont attack them proactively but if they are locked into a conflict with you i might stab them
so in that sense italy is broadly friendly to your interests if you and france are allied i will leave you alone but if france is your enemy i could potentially help you to break a stalemate
but what id need in exchange is for you to keep me posted on developments in the west are you leaning towards working with england or france

it seems for the moment that both are cooperative but im likely to side with the french from the outset barring difficulties with them ill keep you posted same relationship as previously established in any case friendship with the french is not very likely to last past englands demise so ill definitely need the help then thank
makes sense hopefully ill be on the winning side of a conflict against turkey or austria by then which should put us in position to squeeze france
id greatly prefer you end up on austrias side of that conflict all things considered but if things dont go his way i wouldnt blame you for siding against them
definitely understandable but since italy starts off as one of the weaker countries i basically need to play a little opportunistically
the elephant in the room is russia would you have any insight on what theyre planning
unfortunately we only talked very briefly about staying out of each others ways
haha didnt try to hold sweden hostage to get him to play nice with austria thats my usual goto as germany lol
have you talked more with austria i must admit to being concerned about you moving to tyrolia in their defense
since that would allow the two of you to launch a pretty credible attack on venetia

as germany i generally play somewhat more careful get them to just promise not to be an enemy until the western triple becomes a western double as far as austria goes were allied hence my preference for turkey being your foe rather than them ive no intent of turning south though not by any means dont have the pieces for that
yeah fair enough im planning on a pretty standard opening to ionian sea aiming to convoy to tunis and with a bounce in austria
its a pretty noncommittal move so will wait and see how things play out
but im sure nobody will miss the fact that it sets me up for the lepanto if the cards fall that wau
well the lepanto setup is generally considered italys best opener regardless of whether they trust austria hard to argue with a classic
its looking like the russians and the turks are trying a juggernaut
if they do that we desperately need to be strongly allied with the austrians otherwise theyll roll us over hard
i am also concerned about the juggernaut which pushes me towards you and austrias camp
it seems france and england are at a loggerhead already so if you side with england it might be an opportunity for me as well
our interests are aligned in both sides of the map so lets just coordinate closely
id be more comfortable committing both fleets east to support austria against turkey if i knew you were going to burgundy which makes it harder for france to convoy to tuscany
frances f marseille is a major headache for me
what say you

france is definitely going to be a thorn in your side unfortunately i can neither afford to attack them right now nor likely convince them to not attack you theyre more powerful than i am and ive already pissed off two of my three potentially unfriendly neighbors
the balkan front is pretty secure for you two though you can at least hold and with some tricky maneuvering very easily begin advancing through the turks
understood know that austria and italy are not going to be able to hold out against russia and turkey
if you want to prevent a juggernaut we will need whatever help from you we can get
well as im sure youve noticed ive mobilized for the task

ive talked to the french to try and get them off your back but theyre dedicated to seeing you off they told me to tell you that they plan to attack piedmont with support which indicates that theyre probably planning a convoy to tuscany you cant let that happen
well it seems the attack on piedmont with support was genuine which seems like a very poor decision by the french
yeah maybe they predicted that youd think they were lying to me regardless bad move on their part in any case especially since you have a build
good news for you though a distracted france is still more than enough firepower to get you through england and it makes it easy for you to stab them after
i dont know whether you deliberately leaked me that intel thinking i would disbelieve it and go to tuscany but no hard feeling if so
thats jsut well played

it certainly does i wish theyd let you get on with destroying the turks so you could focus fire on them when its needed but still and i gave you that information because i genuinely thought that their objective would be to get you to expect what they told me to tell you so they could do something else was worried that theyd do the convoy because that would be devastating for you
haha honestly that risk was very top of mind for me since i attempted the same convoy as france in the previous game
so would likely have made the risk averse move to avoid the convoy even without the warning
yeah its a real powermove as the french to pull off that convoy
well it didnt work for me either
well experienced italys generally see it coming
indeed

im trying to do damage control with the austrians it was incredibly damaging for them to do that and i cant imagine why theyve decided to side with the turks rather than you if it doesnt work out im going to go nuclear and split them lengthways with the turks
i was taken very surprised in large part because i didnt see and still dont see what they stand to gain
and if they really stand to gain ground why not make a play for venice
no idea the y apparently arent interested in working with you anymore im quite frankly pulling my hair over this its the worst possible move
i find myself very confused by it as well which is part of why i am not quite sure how to respond
would you be willing to coordinate against a tyrolia id be happy to support a munich in
im afraid that if i do that my current position could quickly become untenable im worried that the austrians are planning something funky

alright so i realize that this is a little bit late but now that the austrians are embroiled with the turks i am moving against the french im trying to convince the austrians that its in their best interests to join back with you but i would understand if you might resent him or both of us for our failure to consistently side with you
you stabbing the french is already a massive lifeline to me i could not in good conscious ask you to do more
i will listen to what austria has to say and keep you updated on that front i do not really trust them but i may still be willing to work with them against the turks if they say the right things
im moving on the french this next season hopefully theyll pull back to face me and you and the british will be able to surge back against them
im pleasantly surprised that youre so willing to work with england as well
in that case ill play defensively but try to set myself up for a counteroffensive
well the english are a little miffed that i didnt move last season but still i see no reason not to work with them for the time being
yeah agreed the english are too desperate to turn down your support
conversely you have a free walk into paris right now
since france has only fleets
a mun bur and then to paris is guarrenteed to succeed as long as you can cover a potential stab on mun which you could easily do with a ber
and then a holbel isnt quite as foolproof but is pretty safe as well
especially if you support yourself into nth and move kie hol
if youre wondering who convinced the french to make it a fleet you need go no further
well sounds like things are in good shape
hopefully the french are sufficiently distracted that you can launch a counter attack
yeah ill make the most of this
the austrians wouldnt happen to be talking about me would they
i havent heard anything from them

well at the very least thats good im worried about them potentially deciding that they want warsaw despite the fact that im on the right side of a stalemate line where theyd only get 1 supply center if they attacked
are you coordinating with the turks i think that for the time being that would be a good idea
yeah am trying to do so
not to be needy or anything but i would greatly appreciate a hard move for venice this next year
i will make a play for venice this fall
if i was in austrias shoes i would do a self bounce of f ven tri a ser tri
so i plan to do f alb s f ven tri a apu ven
odds of succeeding in this improve dramatically if also support with a tyr s a apu ven would you be willing to do so
gas and bur likely cannot take mar anyways so in my view you would be better off using a par a pic s a gas bre f nth s f bel eng a bur mun
this would be a nearguarantee that you take brest and would occupy f eng as a consolation prize in the only outcome where you didnt while still covering munich
my only problem with that plan is that it risks losing burgundy if the french pull a fast one and go for silesia instead while moving marseilles into burgundy
thats a valid point my view is that a mar bur is unlikely but a boh sil is a real risk
if you want to keep france out of bohemia a gal is the only unit you have that can do so
which might be a better investment that using it to try and snipe bud
although actually if you hit vienna and france has two disbands they may struggle to keep up the pressure around silesia
thats true i dont know if i want to take my chances with that though
ill probably move into vienna but im not sure i can afford to move out of burgundy
understood so then you would use a gal to cover warsaw a bur to cover munich and then try to snipe vienna with a tyr
correct

messages: hello how goes the mighty tsar
hi italy hope youre doing well where are you planning to head first
greetings russia this is the new italy

this will sound like flattery but i feel like russia is the one country italy cannot offend an italyturkey alliance cannot defeat russia and austria and similarly italy and austria cannot defeat russia and turkey unless germany joins as well
so rather than deciding whether i want to attack austria or turkey id want to target the same one as you
attacking france early is a fools errand
oh shucks so much flattery right out of the gate
its pretty neutral with both so far perhaps youre leaning one way right now
hahaha italy is one of the weaker powers on the board i need to be proactive in seeking allies even if it means accepting being the junior partner and russia is the natural first choice
between austria and turkey i havent had a lot of time to talk to either yet so dont have a clear sense on who would make a better ally
austria has been playing his hands close to his chest while turkey is from my home town but you dont do well in diplomacy by relying on those kinds of calculations
lol usually not where are you looking to focus for now
as is often the case for italy i want to avoid commitment for now and see how the bigger fish play before making my move
it seems theres some hostility between you and germany
am also curious if turkeys move to black sea was arranged or if it also hostile
arranged
understood
so things probably havent been going to plan for either of us
but austria serves as a common enemy
whats your plan for a galicia

messages: hows everyones favorite geopolitical powerhouse

feeling grand not sure if we directly impact each other for a while but we both border people who do i still havent decided what im going to do but knowing if youll be opening against france or not will help me figure it out
greetings from new italy would love to get your thoughts on france and germany
italy typically wants to involve itself more on the eastern triangle but it still borders both
in the west i am likely to play as an opportunist if you ally with one against the third i will help the two of you for a center or two but otherwise i wont get involved

messages: hey friend how goes
hey italy everything well over here we probably wont be directly involved with eachother until midgame but if were both still around a franceitaly alliance could be pretty strong

i also thought i would let you know that i heard from turkeywho i was talking to about attacking russia because we all know how quickly russia can run away with the game that they were planning on attacking you because i think italy is a pretty good player for france to have around im letting you know i dont know how your relationship with austria is but may i suggest a lepanto anyways good luck and have fun
so i guess your new what do you think about this game the above might still apply but i dont know because turkey might change your mind
greetings ill talk to turkey again and see if i think it seems true
agree that early fights between france and italy are often a waste of time for both sides
suggest we demilitarize piedmont and gulf of tyrolia i wont be too happy if you move to spain sc or build a fleet in piedmont either

of course i dont think we should be fightingat least this early in the game and that it would be mutually unproductive i agree with a dmz in piedmont and gulf of tyrolia and we might as well extend it to western mediterranean and north africa but i hope you understand how unreasonable for you to expect me not to move the spain as it is a typical france acquisition also i cant build a fleet in piedmont anyways good luck and have fun
sorry was in a rush to write these since i just entered the game
let me clarify that i have no issue with you moving to spain but im a bit uncomfortable with a fleet in spain sc
i believe spa nc is naturally yours and have no issue with you moving an army there either
as to the piemdont issue i actually meant marseilles
but yeah i see that you have made an antiengland opening so we should get along swimmingly
yes dont worry about a fleet in spain
how is your relationship with germany
pretty solid
whats with the fleet build in marseilles
this stand off in lyotys is a waste of effort for both of us
we would mutually benefit from a deescalation
while that might be true what would you suggest i do with lyo now if you have a good alternative i would be happy to take it as im not super keen on attacking you anyways
i can support myself into piedmont and there is nothing stopping me if you dont want me to give me an alternative
it is very poor faith of you to suggest that your hand was forced in your move to piedmont nobody made you build a f in marseille which can do nothing but attack me in the mediterranean
you only managed to get into piedmont because i was worried that you would attempt the more creative and threatening move of convoying into tuscany
even now those armies would be far better placed in gascony where they are better placed to convoy to england
but to be blunt i dont trust you enough to see much point in talking with you at length
lets just see how far your army in piedmont can get in the end
austrias build in trieste cannot be anything but a play for venice
i am willing to concede it to you if you cooperate elsewhere
hmm i messaged austria and they didnt respond what kind of cooperation elswhere do you want if you concede venice
at this point im at war on too many fronts and i just need to ease the pressure
if we demilitarize and i can focus on recapturing greece that would help me a lot
ok i didnt think germany would betray me but they did no matter what situation your in we have to all start working together to stop germany or they will win
sending this to everyone btw
hello italy
i would require the return of venice as a precondition to any cooperation against germany
naturally attacking rome or naples would also rule this out
well i appreciate you pulling out of apulia
would you be willing to discuss terms regarding venice
jeezus
you have a free path into trieste right now and from there you can pressure vienna
after the hiatus whats your view on the current situation

i view austria as my main adversary and would like to see you hold on to vienna now that austria is occupying venice it also shouldnt make too much of a difference to you whether i take venice or austria does right
okay
in order to stop germany from winning what support do you need from me

messages: good afternoon to you england i think its important that you and i talk about things like belgium and perhaps other situations as you see fit right here at the start
agreed what would you like to see happen in belgium what are your thoughts on bouncing russia im open to many possibilities
well i personally would quite like to have belgiun but im willing to listen to reasons why i shouldnt get it
i think that depends on the russia question
it certainly does russia hasnt communicated with me yet im starting to think that they dont even want to be my friend

well considering frances opening id say you and i can work well against france ive already discussed with italy putting some pressure on piedmont and the med what do you up say you game for a eg sweep

right that opening is particularly aggressive im guessing that theyre mostly doing it to try and keep you out of belgium but in any case it signals that they dont want to be your friend either im guessing youll move back to london
it seems i have no choice what has your communication with france been like
its been pretty limited made some agreements regarding belgium but aside from that theyve been cagey
well you youll be getting 3 builds i would appreciate armys over fleets to help go after france if possibe you think thats in the cards
well be honest with you the agreement was that they would have belgium so if you want you can successfully bounce them there since going from the english channel is the only means of doing so
i dont trust the french not to try to play me for a patsy and youre far more communicative anyways might as well tell you stuff thatll give you the upper hand
by the way the russians are doing some really sus stuff you wouldnt happen to be friendly with them would you
on second thought the fact that the french dont feel trustworthy means that theyre probably lying when they say theyll move to belgium i dunno take it how you will
russia is not very happy with my double fleet east so i havent gotten much from him im hearing rumors of an early jug forming
france stabbed me out the gate we had a dmz in the channel im wary of trusting him i hope you make a play at belgium

i can read a juggernaut when its happening this is definitely one of them russia wouldnt be going after the austrians otherwise you mind supporting me into sweden in the spring we need to head that eventuality off at the pass by all means necessary
hello
mean but not unexpected
youre in tight with france and i havent seen anything to make me think otherwise unfortunate that russia messed up i hope we can work together against france i can make a great ally

look man the french have been pretty agreeable so far so im staying out of their way for the most part im just trying to focus on the russians and keep enough in the west that i cant be easily taken by surprise to be honest
supporting france into the north sea is something i think you might regret
i dont see france getting out of the north and will be looming on you throughout the game
with you getting builds and france getting nothing this might be as good a time as any to stab
you know i was thinking the exact same thing
munbur holbel den support helnth
lets work together
well the question is at this point with me having mistreated you thusfar what incentive do i have to trust you not to do something squirrely instead of working with me no offense meant or anything

none taken im only looking for survival i was double stabbed by france and you so its not like im trying to single you out if i have any shot of staying on the board its to convince you to stab france and maintain my island i dont think theres anything gained other than spite by messing with you and that also means i ultimatley die off

i only ask because your best shot by far if you asked me is if you get me to betray france but at the same time you take a supply center from me so that you keep all your pieces and at the same time throw a wrench in my betrayal so that france and i will be on roughly equal footing while at each others throats bonus points if youre also relaying the plans of betrayal to the french so that they can be countered after all if i win outright youve only delayed the inevitable havent you better to make it messy
but im willing to throw you a bone i wont tell you what im going to do with my units in detail but i will support you into the north sea

i have no way of taking you down a sc my fleet in hel could take kiel but you can cover with ber and either you get bel or i bounce hol either way youre still up because of norway either way i hope we get to work together
i forgot to submit those orders fuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuck
i can do it this next year theres still time for you yet
im disbanding now because you took norway
yuuuuup
hopefully the french are sufficiently distracted that you can launch a counter attack
how can i do that
while theyre pulling back
see
so i assume that you will be moving toward london now
of course gotta get my home centers
well that was incredibly inconvenient of you
what do you want me to do
stop trying to take north sea youre slowing the entire war down
id go so far as to say youre the reason the french are going to get a build
you could have gone to wales and liverpool last turn and had london in the bag but nooooooo youre just so thirsty for the north sea that now youre being used as a pawn by the french
yorkshire now liverpool you get the point
not ugh
thats pretty self righteous speech for someone who stabbed me twice
you moved against me at the same time i moved against you you stabbed me as much as i did you and it was only once im the reason youre still alive and yet youre still stabbing me
bad idea

messages: hey austria how are you
good how about you
wow big moves into eng
eh kinda typical opening
england upset about it
they seem fine obviously not going to be to great of a relationship from this point out though
yeah how about germany ive been talking to him a decent amount he is very chatty but doesnt seem to give away much
i would agree with that me and germany are on good terms
would you be interested in going after italy with me
not right now no i have to figure out my russia and turkey situation
looks like you and germany are allied good luck versus england

thanks i would like you to reconsider my proposal you have become a very powerful country and if you decide to turn on italy there is nothing they can do between the two of us right now turkey and russia are standing each other off and there is no immediate threat from either of them for you italy will be easy supply centers i would of course support you into their territory provided you return the favor we could work out more details if your interested
i have to check the board more i need to balance attacking russia while handling italy also turkey and i are currently friendly but who knows when he will change his mind
but yes we should at least communicate
so what do you think
i cant commit to a full attack yet if russia is mia again then i should be able to
k
just wanted you to know my move into tyr is not at all meant aggresivly at you i am only going to use it to strongarm into venice
i am hoping that is true would have been good of you to talk about it with me
wanna talk about italy
sure
would you be willing to support tyr to venice in return i will support you into one of italys centers in the future this move will also get my troop out of tyr which understandably you dont like
you know what on second thought its fine i can make it into venice on my own by poking tuscany with lyo
okay sounds good either way ill be happy to see tyr moved
ok i didnt think germany would betray me but they did no matter what situation your in we have to all start working together to stop germany or they will win
sending this to everyone btw

you and turkey are the most importand italy and england are basically out of the game anyways we can definitly still stop germany but in order for that to happen you and turkey are going to have to stop fighting right away and work together to get in through germanies back door they are sending basically all of their units to my hometown which means they are going to be vulnerable against you guys
understood youre gonna have to be a go between with me and turkey though because he hates me
agreed i will talk to him more now
ok i spoke with turkey and they are on board so the plan is for you to send some units over to germany where you could get some free builds while all of their units are occupied with attacking me
